name: codemodReplace
description: Apply codemod to replace non-Carbon component with Carbon equivalents. Dry-run default.

codemod_name.description: Name of the codemod to apply (e.g., 'btn-old-to-carbon')

files_glob.description: Glob pattern for files to transform (e.g., 'src/**/*.{tsx,jsx}')

dry_run.description: If true, show patches without applying changes

confirm_destructive.description: Must be true to apply changes to disk
